title: Tender a Full Truckload (FTL) Shipment
description: A logistics coordinator needs to find a carrier for a full truckload shipment and tender the load.

tasks.description: Create a new shipment record with the origin, destination, weight, and required pickup/delivery dates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately enters all shipment details.

tasks.description: Request spot quotes from a list of approved FTL carriers for the shipment's lane.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends out quote requests to multiple carriers.

tasks.description: Review the returned quotes and select the carrier with the best rate and service level.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent makes an optimal decision based on the provided quotes.

tasks.description: Tender the load to the selected carrier, sending them all necessary pickup information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully tenders the load and receives a confirmation from the carrier.
